We came here for lunch and it was delicious. Reservations are easy to secure here than at their other restaurant Tickets.  They are right across the street from each other.I think this is a much better lunch place than a dinner place.  We had the waiter pick our dishes.  It was much easier this way and everything she brought out was good.  Place is almost closer to your traditional tapas dishes, but with few different flares you'd expect from Albert Adria.Service here was top notch.  Very courteous and speaks English pretty well for us non Spanish speakers.
